alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:09PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...SOUTH CENTRAL NEW HAVEN AND NORTHERN WESTCHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 609 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Georgetown, or 7 miles north of New Canaan, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Stamford, Norwalk, Danbury, Milford, Shelton, New Canaan, Mount Kisco, Newtown, Fairfield, Stratford, Trumbull, Westport, Ridgefield, and Darien. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut...and southeastern New York.
